name: Ramen Spice Girls from Bang Dream BETA
name_original: Ramen Spice Girls from Bang Dream BETA
description:
4 years have passed since Afterglow disbanded. Tomoe, Himari and Ako formed a new band. The Udagawas, who also play in a band,  are very supportive of their daughters. Tomoe and her mother Athena looks back into what brought them here 

Athena  and Melody  are original characters that will soon have their own story. This is a beta and the full version will be released in late February. Follow me for more!
